statements: DELETE FROM error_correction_results WHERE experiment_name = 'Experiment A';
DELETE FROM error_correction_results WHERE record_id = 100 AND experiment_name = 'Experiment A';
DELETE FROM error_correction_results WHERE correction_success = TRUE AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM experimental_data WHERE qubit_number < 5 AND method_id = 3;
DELETE FROM error_correction_results WHERE error_rate > 0.5 AND correction_success = FALSE;
DELETE FROM qubits WHERE qubit_location = 'Quantum Lab';
DELETE FROM qubits WHERE qubit_type = 'logical' AND qubit_location = 'A1';
DELETE FROM success_rates WHERE quantum_circuit_name = 'QFT' AND error_correction_success = TRUE;
DELETE FROM correction_data WHERE correction_time < '2022-01-01' AND correction_action = 'revert';
